title: (LFT)  Looking for a team that plays serious and wants to enter tournaments.
body:
Hey guys,
I am looking for a team that wants to play serious and want to enter tournaments in the future. 

Role: I can play any role but jungle, will be willing to learn jungle for the team though.
Rank: This season Gold 3 so far. Last season I got into to high play and stopped playing for almost 8 months so I got demoted back into gold.
Champion Pool: Depending what the team comp is for both teams.
IGN: OceanC
Age pref: 18+ just so I get along well with people roughly my own age but if any younger it doesn't bother me.
Availability: I am currently unsure when I would be available because I am currently looking for a new career but while still looking I will be available pretty much every day except for Monday and Tuesday until the afternoon.

I have Skype, Team speak and ventrillo for communication.
